channel.title: [REQ] Trade button timers [REQ]
channel.description:
[center]I need the method to add Trade button (Accept & Decline) timers. To disable the dupe, if anyone has the method, please share it with me, I'll credit when I release the server, thanks. (I'm working on the Original Delta).
Also, if anyone has a tutorial to add a Trade/Attack/Drop timer, could you please link me to the tutorial? I've tried searching and got no where. Thanks.
I'll once again, credit you.
Many thanks.[/center]
